Reviews.Title: “Frist Class”
Reviews.Author: perthchrissie
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 nights after our cruise. Was upgraded into Premier Room which included the crystal club facilities. Can not fault this hotel, the location is right on Orchard Road, but not noisy, the room was very warm & clean (you don't want to leave the room) the crystal club was the best, we had personalised service, the staff remembered your name & also what you drink (they made your drinks) The staff were very friendly, we normally stay at the Holiday Inn, I would highly recommend this hotel over any, next time I come to Singapore I will definitely stay here

Reviews.Title: “GREAT service”
Reviews.Author: gregii_la
Reviews.Content: Ever so friendly and accommodating. Staff here are very friendly, helpful and approachable. Location is 'pretty much on Orchard Road' (67 steps from the entrance), opposite of Paragon (shopping complex). I treated this room as 'sleep and internet' because my trip was Singapore, not Grand Park Orchard. Access to transportation is good. If you want to stay in a hotel that knows your name and looks after you, look no further. It's no MBS or Hilton, but they will look after you BETTER than these hotels. ONLY criticisms I can give is the room I stayed in, it doesn't seem professionally assembled (crooked bars, taps)... only to do with aesthetics.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Felix_Wuff
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for a full week due to a business trip. Very friendly staff all around, excellent service. Clean and trendy rooms; internet comes both wired and wireless, especially the wired connection is speedful and stable. A little minus for the location of the pool and the gym, you have to cross the lobby for both - which is a bit weird, wearing a bath robe. Very nice and delicious breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Pros & Cons”
Reviews.Author: kina28
Reviews.Content: Stayed here during easter promotion. Paid almost SGD$800 for 3 nights stayed. Located in d middle of orchard road right next to Paragon. Check-in is on 4th floor. Requested quiet & higher floor but was given room on 6th floor. Wasn't impress with d room as it looks smaller than d pics in website. There was no view, only view of construction & it's noisy. Quite a number of TV channels but boring selections. Available dvd player & Ipod/Iphone dock. Very comfortable bed but d lights not bright enough. Useless table clock as it did not show d proper time. Tried to adjust it but couldn't find any button for settings. WiFi was not all that. Had to go to d bathroom to get a stronger connection. Room service was good but not house-keeping. Left in d morning & got back around 3pm, found house-keeping in d room. The lady was not friendly and was frowning. Couldn't understand her English. Did not expect this in 5 stars hotel. Did not find her clean well, doubt she vacuum d floor, & toiletries were not replaced. Had to ask her for d missing items. Upon check-out, told d receptionist regarding d house-keeping. All she could say was will inform but did not see her write/file down. 1 more thing, found ants in d room esp on d table. In a nut shell, hotel is excellent for its location but not other aspects. Was disappointed somehow.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Guy V
Reviews.Content: We had a short stay at this hotel and experienced a very professional and friendly staff. We had a problem just before we had to leave. This was resolved immediately at no extra cost. This hotel looks after their guests!

Reviews.Title: “Modern and Location. Say no more”
Reviews.Author: Jaynyc2
Reviews.Content: Beautiful, modern, relatively new hotel located in the heart of Orchard Road. While the address says Orchard Road, it is really on a side street just off of Orchard Road. One taxi driver knew exactly where the hotel was. Another had no clue and I had to give him some landmarks (next to Paragon. Across from Ngee Ann City). When you enter the hotel, you have to take the lift to the floor, walk across the lobby to take a lift to the guest rooms. I was upgraded to the Crystal Club floor, which entitled access to the Crystal Club (with free breakfast). WiFi was free, though sluggish at times having me log back in from time to time.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Robin L
Reviews.Content: A very grand and fabulous hotel in Singapore. They have the best service staff and efficient service. Facilities are limited but sufficient. I stayed in the Crystal Club Floor, the room was rather cozy and relaxing. The location is good as it is in the heart of Singapore's shopping district, Orchard Road. When I arrived, I felt that this hotel is very modern and classy. The bellmen were very helpful, although the reception was slightly slow but their good service made up for it. And when I requested for Extra blankets and for the housekeeping to make-up my room, the staff on the phone was determined to make sure that I was satisfied. Overall my stay at the hotel was enjoyable and a pleasant one. If I have a chance to come to Singapore again, this hotel will definitely be my first choice.

Reviews.Title: “It's all about LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!”
Reviews.Author: Keslergo
Reviews.Content: Date of Stay: February 10-13,2012 Reservations: Agoda.com Room Type: Deluxe Room Upgrade: Deluxe Club Room Loyalty Card: Location: Just across from Paragon and Ngee Ann City, I’ve already stayed at this hotel twice when the rates at Grand Hyatt are too high. Everything on Orchard is within walking distance from the hotel. Check-in: I was informed I was being upgraded upon check in however I actually asked if its possible to request fro a room facing the other side because the rooms facing Paragon has a metal shade which blocks the light from coming in. Unfortunately there are no rooms available so I had to settle with it. Room: Room is small but adequate…it's okay for a solo traveller but I think if you had a companion it would be a tight squeeze. Specially after spending days of shopping and all the loot is scattered on the hotel room floor. The only thing bothering me is the photo on top of the headboard. I don't know who she is, and don't know why the designers have selected to put a photo of her in guestrooms, it would have been better if it’s a photo of Singapore or Nature…something less…hmmm freaky. Bathroom: I like the bathroom layout although it’s not big, the shower stall with a separate tub is very spacious. Check-out: Check-out was simple, since everything was prepaid, I didn't have to deal with anything upon check out and was out of the hotel in less than 10 minutes. Overall: It’s all about Location! Location! Location! Meritus Mandarin is just across but the rooms there are really crappy, so for about the same price you get good location and a better room.

Reviews.Title: “Weekend Orchard Shopping trip”
Reviews.Author: Christopher S
Reviews.Content: Great location on Orchard in the middle of the Golden mile on Singapore's premier shopping strip. This hotel offers excellent service and amenities you would expect in any 5 star Orchard Rd hotel but without the 5 star price. The staff were helpful, courteous and friendly. Only draw back was cleaning of our room during our stay left a little to be desired.

Reviews.Title: “Best value great serivce”
Reviews.Author: 2012travelguide
Reviews.Content: A great hotel, Crystal Club Floor, wonderful service attention to detail. Very welcoming great service, great position, Suitable to both couples and families rooms not overly large but comfortable Transfer arranged and prompt and efficient A great experience.

Reviews.Title: “beware of noise, lots of noise”
Reviews.Author: ccaappccoo
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the hotel April 5 - 8. Location is excellent, directly opposite Paragon arcade, and close to Mardarin hotel, Takashimaya and Nee On City. Entrance is at Bideford Road, and from the entrance at ground level one has to take a lift to 4th Floor and walk across the entire length of the hall to the passenger lifts at the end of the hall. Hotel was booked in HK via travel agent. Prepaid room price was slightly over US$300 per night all in. Breakfast was included. Here comes the tricky part: the hotel has a gigantic electronic billboard on its front facing Orchard Rd. The electronic billboard was hellishly noisy, emitting bright lights throughout the entire day non-stop from 9:30 a.m. until 11:30 p.m. each and every day. To add insult to injury, in addition to the monstrously large and noisy electronic billboard, the hotel's bar located on 4th Floor is visible from certain rooms. The rooms most affected are located near the passenger lifts. The bar is a noisy place and the noise is IN ADDITION to the noise from the electronic billboard. We didn't know this at check-in, and they tried to slip us a noisy room on the 7th floor next to the lift. But as soon as we opened the room door we knew we were screwed as the noise was deafening, and while we were looking down to the bar 3 floors down, people sitting in the bar were looking up at us ! there was absolutely no privacy. We asked for a room change pointing out the noise issues and to the hotel's credit, they obliged without any struggle and we were given a smaller room on 10th floor looking at the back. The view wasn't great at the back but at least it was quiet. The room size was small but passable, all the equipment worked properly. Minibar prices were exorbitant but that is to be expected in this class of hotel. The bed was OK, the room was clean. The aircon is slightly colder than it should but one quickly gots used to it. Straits Times newspaper was delivered daily in the morning and placed in a slot outside the room for pickup by guests. Breakfast was included and it was quite OK, the best part is the fresh fruits, lots of it. The management should seriously think about getting rid of the electronic billboard, lose the rental for that monstrous piece of equipment, but gain lots of appreciative customers who will stay there again. Those rooms with window which looks down at the bar and vice versa should be turned into function rooms, as they are not suitable to sleep in. That, or they cut the size of the bar. But perhaps the hotel has a design flaw which can't be rectified easily.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service!”
Reviews.Author: iag2011
Reviews.Content: Grand Park Orchard is located directly across the street from Takashimaya Dept. store and Paragon Mall. The service staff and amenities in the Crystal Club level were outstanding, catering to our every needs. The staff could speak several languages, including Bahasa Indonesia and English. One evening I was sick and didn't go out with our group for dinner. The staff on-duty that evening had prepared a off-menu dish for me. The next time he saw me, he made it a point to ask if I was better. Our 1 bedroom suite was very nice, and had full-size computer monitor and keyboard(free wifi) and many other amenities. Although the living room area was not the biggest space, there was enough room for our group of 6 to gather before heading out. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value”
Reviews.Author: Clovis G
Reviews.Content: Have been there for a week on business. The Crystal Club services are fantastic - good welcome, quiet at the room and very good support from the staff at the Club. Had utilized the meeting room for 3 times and always with good suport - they provided cofee, tea, etc like an office of my own. And no extra price for the meeting room use, all included in the Club. For business people without local office a very good option. The refreshments and cocktails in the afternoon were very well serviced, with nice food and beverages, the breakfast was well served. No remarks. The staff was very nice and happy to help you all the time. I will stay there on any mext visit.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: ctashana
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the club deluxe room for 3 nights in March. The service is excellent, they usher us to the club lounge for check in and the reception can speak bahasa indonesia, as we are Indonesian this is a plus. The room is quite small but it has everything that we needed even dvd player, ipod dock, free wifi and we get the option to choose the breakfast place in the louge or the coffee shop. The price is quite reasonable as well, as it is already include free wifi and breakfast for 2. Hotel rooms in singapore mostly charge extra for this. The location is also great as it is in the middle of Orchard room. We will definitely consider to stay at this hotel again when we visit singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Sensational!”
Reviews.Author: Mathew C
Reviews.Content: This is by far the nicest hotel I have stayed in recently. Everything from the service (almost too good), location and the standard of rooms. I highly recommend upgrading to the Crystal Club. Makes you feel even more exclusive and no one can argue with the drinks and nibbles every evening. Also a great bar down stairs. Would definately advise family and friends to choose this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “It's best feature is its location”
Reviews.Author: waitwhatsnext
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in late Feb and was upgraded to a Club room. Even this room was quite small but clean and with a modern feel. The breakfast buffet was OK as hotel breakfast buffets go. We only ate there on the first day and after that found places like Wild Honey nearby that are much better and cheaper as well. The staff are fantastically helpful and friendly. This hotels best feature is it's location tho.

Reviews.Title: “Convenience hotel”
Reviews.Author: ELRITA07
Reviews.Content: Please adjust to lower price and add Food & Beverage for breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Fab barman”
Reviews.Author: SAMSCROSS
Reviews.Content: Stayed here early Mar and got upgraded to Club room which was quiet nice.The breakfast and bar food was good and staff very friendly.The barman was most helpful and recommended we go to Clarks Quay for something to eat which turned out to be great and would never have found out about it only for him.

Reviews.Title: “Very loud noise from water flow next door”
Reviews.Author: puriindah
Reviews.Content: We stayed 6nights in march 2012. Location is excellent close to paragon and takashimaya Clean room. Beds are a little bit small especially if you are European standards but in Singapore beds are small Only drawback was we could hear "loud" water flowing and tap turning when someone next room uses the bathroom 1 oclock in the morning Housekeeping kept cutting down our small and medium towels and we had to remind them that we needed those Room cleaning was also very late at 4pm every day so when we came back , room was not clean all the time Other than that it was a fair stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, service, everything!”
Reviews.Author: Lzl25
Reviews.Content: I am absolutely in love with this hotel. I would definitely stay here again. It is in the perfect location on Orchard road, the staff are friendly and the decor is chic and modern. The room was lovely and fitted with modern amenities. I wouldn't recommended it is a family hotel though however.

Reviews.Title: “A PERFECTLY located hotel to be for a (shopping & food fest) short weekend!”
Reviews.Author: Ashton168
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an awesomely located hotel, well, this is it!! It is conveniently located on Orchard Road, where all the shopping, food & people actions are!! My sister & I stayed for 2 nights for a shopping weekend & thought it was a perfect hotel to be in terms of location. The hotel itself is modern & quite new approx. 2 years old) as it was totally renovated from its days of the old Crown Prince Hotel. Rooms are rather small (compared to other hotel, such as Mandarin Orchard which is located across the road), but I purely chose this hotel because I've stayed at Mandarin Orchard & wanted to try a newer hotel. In saying that, it is still OK for a short weekend as we were hardly in the room, & it was only there for us to freshen up & sleep, all other times were spent in Orchard eating & shopping! Rooms are kept adequately clean...in addition, for a hotel which is located in the hustle & bustle heart of Singapore the rooms are comfortably quiet. Staff are polite, friendly & quite efficient. One morning I forgot to put my diamond rings & watch but they were left untouched in the room, so cleaning staff are to be highly regarded for their honesty & integrity. If I must make a weak point of the place, is that the check in lobby is located on the 4th floor & we always have to take 2 lifts in order to get to our room everytime. Not so sure as to the reason for this as both guests & non-guests can always take the lifts to the room floors without swipe/room keys, so security was a tad disappointing. We know Singapore hotels can be quite expensive, I think the room rate was quite reasonable for its premier & convenient location, I would definitely recommend this establishment, but perhaps only for couples or girls trips as I think it would be too crammed for a family for sure!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great staff, great location!”
Reviews.Author: CPRatna
Reviews.Content: Stayed in a very beautiful premier twin room on 10th floor. It was a great room with very nice view. Staff were all very helpful and friendly. Will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “One week stay”
Reviews.Author: Rtravel-the-world
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel crew, polite and caring and willing to make the best out of your stay. Rooms are very nice, clean, comfortable. Good restaurant for lunch & dinner, big breakfast. Take the christal club room when available. perfect service!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel,highly recommended!”
Reviews.Author: CindyZX
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, great location - within walking distance to everywhere (MRT stations, restaurants, shopping centres etc etc) The lobby was fabulous. The room was also very well designed! Internet was free there and the speed was fast! Staff members were friendly and helpful!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, affordable too”
Reviews.Author: Meysha10
Reviews.Content: The drawback was housekeeping staff had forgotten to resupply toilet amenities and clean towels two consecutive days. Otherwise economically sensible for strategic location

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, romantic and convenient place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth L
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Grand Park Orchard on 29 January on the way back to Perth from Malaysia. I have stayed at the old Park Hotel numerous times before its major renovation. This was the first time I stayed at Grand Park Orchard after the renovation. As I stepped into the lobby on the 4th floor, the modern and sleek decor caught my eyes immediately. Checking in was very quick and within 2 minutes after I walked into my room, the concierge had delivered my luggage to my room. The room was not very big but comfortable enough for two people. Decoration of the room was romantic and modern. Room was very clean and modern. Hotel was surrounded by shopping centres. It is located at the most convenient location on Orchard Road. Free internet access in the room was a big bonus. Breakfast had a good variety of food. Bed was very comfortable and gosh... sound proof in the room was exceptionally good. I love this hotel and will not hesitate to recommend it to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great location with good disabled facilities”
Reviews.Author: FloraWood
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel in July 2011 with my cousin and 90 year old grandmother. We requested a triple share room with wheelchair accessible bathroom. Whilst my grandmother is not confined to a wheelchair we wanted to eliminate any risk of having a shower over a bathtub. While there was some confusion over our requirements during the booking stage we were relieved to receive a twin room with roll away bed and wheelchair accessible bathroom. Unfortunately the drainage in the bathroom left something to be desired and entire bathroom was left flooded whenever anyone had a shower. This posed a hazard for anyone using the bathroom after someone had showered but staff were responsive when we called reception and requested someone to mop it up each morning. Staff were very good and accommodating and paid special attention to my elderly grandmother. We were even able to borrow a wheelchair from the hotel for part of our stay and the hotel has a wheelchair ramp at the front to make access easy. Location is very central on Orchard Rd. Only drawback is the swimming pool. It has a glass side which reminds me of a seal exhibit at a zoo as people by the pool, bar and reception can see you underwater in the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Boutique Hotel Close to everything”
Reviews.Author: David H
Reviews.Content: Had a excellent stay for 7 nights for a family event. This hotel is right in the middle of Orchard Rd shops, very convenient for shopping, yet quiet and relaxing. Interior is modern, stylish and clean. Booking a club room was well worthwhile, with many enjoyable hours spent relaxing over breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails, chatting with the friendly and professional staff.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Jan B
Reviews.Content: Close to train station, bus and shopping centers. Great location, nice large rooms with all amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service and Fantastic Location”
Reviews.Author: Toni F
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed in this hotel for 5 nights only very recently. This is the second time we have stayed in this hotel and can not speak highly enough of the staff. The location of the hotel is ideal due to it being right on Orchard Road and so close to Somerset MRT station. It is also very close to the underground supermarket at Paragon if you require anything. We stayed in the Club Rooms and the service we received in the Crystal Club was absolutely outstanding. Hashim, Allam and Susan from the Crystal Club all provided outstanding service and nothing was ever too much trouble. They always had time to have a chat and a laugh and also provided information to ensure you got the best out of your stay in Singapore, they really are a credit to the hotel. The Crystal Club does provide guests with private check in/out facilities along with a limited breakfast, afternoon tea and evening drinks and canapés which is perfect after a long day shopping. It is great to have time to relax before heading out for the evening. The only negative we have in regard to the hotel was the air-conditioning. We tried to adjust the temperature but it was still like an ice box so at times we had to turn it off to remain comfortable. We will definitely be back to stay at Grand Park Orchard Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: David L
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd time we have stayed here. We usually choose Mandarin (opposite) or this hotel. This time around we chose it as we got the club room and internet included. The service is always excellent, its always great that theres always somebody at the lift to have the lift opened before you get to the door! Only issue we had was there were no towels when we checked in, but thats a little issue, there was a house keeper in the hall so it was quickly sorted out. I accidently left $200 in the open, and was surprised it wasnt touched. Breakfast is ok, nothing fantastic, but it covers all bases. Clean modern rooms, only that the rooms are slightly small. I took a club room this time as i thought it would be a touch bigger, but it looked the same size. Overall its a great hotel and yes we would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “central location”
Reviews.Author: Kasun P
Reviews.Content: It was a last minute online booking and we arrived to the place bit too early but early check-in was arranged in a very friendly manner.The hotel's location is great and almost every place around is in walking distance . the newly refurbished rooms are in top quality. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Pick this hotel for Location for tired feet”
Reviews.Author: Tsa_RyszardMom
Reviews.Content: Compare to its competitor in term of room spacious,yes it is cramp.my room 827 had problem with aircon,call to fix it no prob,but my other room 831 also got aircon problem.The bathtub is narrow,for me 172cm i can only soak 1/4 of my body. Yes the housekeeping standar is an issue,they didnt give hand/face towel whereas theres a hangging but no towel.Nevertheles they always knock my door around 9-ish and clean all my 4 room. Room service is Ok but menu not that complete,the in room breakfast package american breakfast is so so compare to royal plaza.Hainan chicken good,nasi goreng really greasy taste not Ok,seafood horfun very delicious. The reception is Ok fast,they give 2 room as I arrived arround 11,and the rest they give it around 5. Quick step to 7/11 for snack etc,little step arrived to Paragon,so very convinient for Location. About noise yes i can hear some noise,my room very near elevator but my family didnt bother with any noise. However the pillow very not comfy,sleep quality not great. Also the bathroom no toilet shower,yes they have problem with bathroom smell and the drain,but maybe its understandable its an old renovated hotel. But i hardly ever spend much time only sleep and shower,so for me still acceptable.BUt if you want leisure maybe go to Intercontinental/Goodwordpark for really fine hotel room.

Reviews.Title: “Family holiday”
Reviews.Author: JLotsos
Reviews.Content: The location is fabulous if you want to be right near the shops. We had a club room and the rooms are pretty small but we did manage to put a cot in the room. I think most hotel rooms in Singapore are small but i Singapore is not the sort of place that you want to just sit around in a hotel room as there is too much action outside. There is a afternoon tea in the club lounge every afternoon but don't expect much. Some very small dry sandwiches, a few small cakes and dry biscuits. We asked for a pot of tea and was told by the butler the machine does it for you and when we asked for milk the butler told the lady off for getting us some and made us have the hot frothy milk from the espresso machine which is not very nice in tea. Very poor service when you are paying for a club room. It was not a relaxed atmosphere. We couldn't check into our room until 5pm which is quite late and they knew that there was three adults in the room but gave us a room with two single beds. However without a fuss they did move us to a room with more beds. We had the buffet breakfast in the main restaurant which was very nice. Forget the club room breakfast. The pool is small and as long as you don't mind walking through an outside bar area to get to the pool you will be fine. Not a place to have a swim at nignt when everyone is dressed up and looking at you from the bar. Overall it was a fairly nice hotel but The Royal Plaza on Scotts which is similar in price has a far better club room. Stay here if you want to be right near the shops!

Reviews.Title: “Close to the action and nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ton363
Reviews.Content: This hotel is right next to bustling Orchard Road, the heartbeat of Singapore's shopping district. It is also within a close vicinity of the other attractions of Singapore - airport, Sentosa island, zoo and botanical gardens, restaurants around the city. The hotel is very clean, modern and cosy. The club level breakfast feels small but you can order what you wish. All the amenities are available on the club level are worth the extra (internet with webcam, specific hotel staff and laundry items). The only pity was the check-in that should have been directed to the club level for speedier check-in instead of general reception. The pool and bar area are very inviting and the gym is quite good and well located, given its size. All in all, a good stay that we would consider again on a trip to Singapore. Loved the city - clean, hospitable and ease of communication!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel and Great for Shoppers”
Reviews.Author: kenthien
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in Orchard opposite of Ngee Ann City and beside Paragon. This will be the ideal hotel for shoppers. The hotel staffs are great, friendly and helpful. The only downside is the room is a bit small though. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to stay in Orchard.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Location”
Reviews.Author: Ruby_Roo_08
Reviews.Content: Excellant location, close to everything. We stayed on the 10th floor, which didnt have much of a view (a construction site). We requested a nice view as it was our honeymoon. The rooms are nice however bathrooms are very small but clean. We had access to the crystal lounge, which was excellant. Staff in here were helpful and food and drinks after a long day was great. Howie, from Conceige was fantastic and always willing to help

Reviews.Title: “Nice new hotel”
Reviews.Author: nicholasdamian
Reviews.Content: Well, as expected, the rooms are very small but it is expected from Singapore. What I like is the coziness of the rooms and the it is located in the heart of Orchard. The price can be too steep for the small room but I guess I went for convenience, and also free internet which is a must in this day and age (Mandarin Orchard is quite nice too but the franchise hotels are too outdated with customers having to pay for internet). I will definitely come back here every time I travel to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Really Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: NomadLooloo
Reviews.Content: Like all Asian hotels, they also have thick slippers! I know some people don't care about that but we do and it's cool that they have it. Customer service is also really good and nothing beats their location - if you like shopping and walking around. Their room is also nice - we just had a minor problem with the hair dryer (it started spitting out small black plastic pieces and sounded like it was about to explode) but other than that, everything was fine. (Didn't pay much attention to the fact that we had a picture of a blonde model above our bed haha) But we will definitely come back!

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: hotelgetaways
Reviews.Content: Crystal club 11 floor is really the place to relax and pamper yourselves with great service and food after a busy stressful week. Residents can habe the bird-eye view of bustling Orchard road while enjoying the peaceful and quiet ambience when relaxing at the Crystal club. Furthermore, the hotel and the staff were very responsive to resident's enquires, and generous with their high quality food and cocktail even though its complimentary benefits of the Crystal club residents. Needless to say, the cleanliness and housekeeping are excellent. Overall, its really a good bargain, and I will definitely visit grand park orchard again.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Sensation”
Reviews.Author: World_Traveller87_11
Reviews.Content: Graded as a 5 star hotel, located in town of Singapore, it is a perfect place for accommodation. With perfect service at the reception counter, plus a quality house-keeping standard, Grand Park Orchard is as good as a home. Crystal Club serve residents of the hotel with respect and smile, with good butler to pamper us.

Reviews.Title: “One of the nicest club lounges - great business trip!”
Reviews.Author: fluffychick17
Reviews.Content: Travelling to Singapore and Malaysia regulary for business we have stayed in several of the many many hotels in Singapore. This was a first time in the Grand Park Orchard, and we hope not the last. The staff were all very good. Susan (and her team) in the Crystal lounge were excellent, Hashim, Yvette, Sammi and Alun were particulary friendly and made an effort to look after us (10 day stay). As a husband and wife team, but business guests, the rooms were nice, but not spacious to work in and a bit cramped for for a longish stay (although we had booked a crystal club premier king), however, we were always welcomed to work in the lounge or to use the meeting room (which we did alot). The instant connection to wireless was great ( some hotels use codes so it made a nice change to just click open and go). If we have any less positive comments, the pool and the gym are located off the reception and bar area and without changing rooms and so you feel very exposed walking down past lots of other guests in bathers and a robe and returning via the bar wet, or for the gym, having to return to your room all hot and sweaty! It would be perfect if the fitness amenaties were a little better planned. But too late now as all built. :) all in all a good trip however, and we would plan to return next time.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: faura
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights in November 2011 in a deluxe room. Seems to be popular with medical tourists, especially from Indonesia. Probably because of the hospitals nearby. Great location in the middle of Orchard rd. Pros: Excellent service from the staff. Apart from a long delay at check-in, the staff were friendly, prompt, and very courteous. And the elevator button was always pressed, so the elevator would be waiting for you. The deluxe room was comfortable and well insulated from noise. So I can only imagine all the other rooms are even better. Good amenities in the bathroom, including a rainfall shower that was a nice touch. Breakfast and lunch were quite decent. Maybe after several days one would tire of the offerings, but that would be your fault for not pacing yourself :). Generally high quality everywhere - architecture, linens, etc. No cons really, but some minor things that made us go "huh?" They advertise great views of Orchard Rd from the swimming pool. Unless you count the tops of buildings and trees as a view, you don't really see anything. The pool is in a strange location, with the reception area next to it, separated by a glass wall. Every room has a painting of a blonde woman in various dresses, it takes up a whole wall at the head of the bed. (see traveler photos by other guests.) Strange, bemusing, and since it's about the only decoration in the room, I'd love to know the story behind the choice of this curious interior decoration. To get to your room, you climb up stairs outside, take an elevator upstairs to the lobby area, walk across the length of the hotel to another elevator bank take that up to your floor. Kind of a trudge.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: cachoux
Reviews.Content: this brand new hotel is the really spot to go in singapor : deluxe rooms are not big but very very well concieved, nothing missing.and quiet Nice lobby, nice outside bar,good restaurant tiny swimming pool but enough as we spend a lot of time sightseeing and shopping

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: AussieRedwine
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4nights in October. We had booked two rooms for 4adults 3children, which was accepted as we booked direct with hotel. On arrival we were informed we had to use existing bedding, which was 2king beds. On booking we were given the impression a rollout would be supplied at no charge for a child. This was incorrect for an additional charge of $80per night we could have rollout. After a discussion with the manager he agreed to allow us one rollout at no extra charge. Although not ideal this was all that was offered. The rooms are very small so really not ideal for families. We had booked crystal club, this club the staff (females) where very accommodating and friendly. We have stayed in executive clubs in other hotels which are much better. The nibbles were not replenished regularly, so if you were a little late into the club you had very little selection, so the idea is to get in very early. Hopefully they will rectify this .

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: seda79
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Grand Park in late October on a family vacation for 3 nights. We had two rooms on the Crystal Club Floor. Location: Fantastic if you want to explore Singapore by MRT (great underground transportation system) You have the choice of getting on the MRT at 313@Sommerset which is also a really nice shopping mall with great places to have a drink (especially "Brotzeit" an alfresco Pub serving German beers and providing free WIFI internet) or catch MRT at Orchard station which is located at the new "ION" shopping mall. The excellent location will make up for the slightly high price tag of the Grand Park. Rooms/ Amenities: The rooms are modern, the beds very comfortable (my folks slept as long as never before) and the bathroom comes with a great rain shower. All in all; very functional and comfortable rooms but nothing to write a postcard home. Service: As we were staying at the Crystal Club floor (which I can recommend) we had access to the Crystal Club Lounge managed by the ever smiling and ever present Susan. Susan and her team of concierges were great, always up for a chat and full of helpful information for your daily activities. They will recommend the best way for you to go China Town, Little India etc as well as good restaurants and shops. The complimentary afternoon teas and 5 o'clock cocktail hours were very pleasant. All staff we dealt with was polite, well groomed and courteous. Food and Beverage: Breakfast at the main restaurant was good with a large choice of Western and Asian dishes. You may want to ask for fresh machine coffee (they happily provide) which is excellent. Breakfast at the Crystal Club Lounge was a bit smaller but OK and the coffee and tea selection is great. There is a large outdoor lounge/ bar area by the pool which is OK for a late night drink. Verdict: The location has convinced me I have done the right choice. If you can, go for Crystal Club Floor so you can have the little extras that just make your day that much more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “No Refund Policy Stings”
Reviews.Author: Jim K
Reviews.Content: This month booked this hotel via Agoda.com.au and on the same day cancelled the booking. Site was misleading and although I got a confirmation of the cancellation but because of the hotel's no refund policy, I lost over A$1,400 for nothing. Not knowing that there is no refund I then booked a differenct hotel for A$1,200. Please in the future do not book hotels that have a no refund policy.

Reviews.Title: “Just not too sure about it”
Reviews.Author: 14NABster
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for two weeks due to business. I am just not too sure about it. For the rate paid I would expect more of everything. The room was small and it din't feel like new and luxuries. I would've expected more from a hotel in Singapore on Orchard road. I had the deluxe room which had the view on a construction site. I am afraid it will become a high rise so the view from the small window won't improve. the bathroom was ok although it felt it needed some repair. The outside bar and swimming pool look nice but the drinks are too expensive the music too loud when visited in the evening. more a club than a place to unwind. If i haven't had a conference near the hotel, I would've probably booked a different hotel. Still it is far from a bad hotel. It is just not what I woul have expected.

Reviews.Title: “Location and service excellence”
Reviews.Author: Athelstonian
Reviews.Content: I took my two daughters and a 13yr old Grand Daughter for 5 days shopping in Singapore, we had 2 twin bedded adjoining rooms andour booking included the Crystal Lounge privileges - well worth it. The hotel is not too huge and able to give good service, taking the time to explain things and very fast to get back to you with answers. We appreciated the free WiFi throughout the hotel and the ability to print boarding passes in the lounge for free. The Staff - particularly all the staff in the Club lounge ( incl Nora) were exceptionally helpful. The concierge was a fountain of knowledge and made all bookings effortless. No complaints what so ever. This hotel has the best location, in house spa and pool, great food and free French Champagne in the club lounge. Emily gives a fantastic "deep Tissue" massage too!

Reviews.Title: “Best value for Orchard 2011”
Reviews.Author: bminata
Reviews.Content: Much nicer than the last one I stayed in for only slightly higher price, so I guess it's a good value. Much better location too - smack in the middle of Orchard Road, across Meritus Mandarin. To get better hotel at this location you need to go to a much higher price. Minor negative point: you need to go thru two elevators to get to your room.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Service, Brilliant Crystal Club Lounge, Supurb”
Reviews.Author: George H
Reviews.Content: Above Expectations in all areas. Great Style, Nicely appointed rooms, with many inclusions, such a free internet, laundry, afternoon tea, evening cocktails, super late checkout, dvd player, Sony TV, huge shower, good breakfast. Best of all though was the service and the Club Lounge. ALL the staff (especially Nora Lynn and her colleagues whose names I wrote down but can not find now) were wonderful and very warm, friendly people. They were genuine and made you feel at home everytime you walked in the lounge. They also served Verve Cliquot Champagne each night, along with a full bar and nibbles which was excellent. We started our stay on the right foot, with a 5PM! late checkout, as we had a night flight and ended it with Nora Lynn walking us to our taxi personally when we left - and then in a true show of how dedicated the staff are, would not accept my tip. I really must stress how much my wife and I enjoyed this hotel, but especially the Club Lounge staff. They really made our stay special. Will definitely return to this hotel. Location is perfect too.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in Orchard”
Reviews.Author: chongoc
Reviews.Content: I stayed 2 nights at this hotel on my recent business trip. I thought the price was a bit on the bit on the high side but it's smack in the middle of Orchard Road. The complimentary Champagne on arrival was a nice touch and refreshing. They also gave S$100 shopping voucher from Knightsbridge from 2 designer labels. I was also upgraded to the Club Room as the deluxe was full. A bit disappointed by the size but was just using it sleep so it didn't matter too much. Other plus points are It was very clean, it has a gym with limited state of the art cardio threadmills. (Bring your ear phones as the threadmill had personal TV monitors). Lastly they have a nice spread of breakfast buffet. Not as many choices as other 4/5stars hotels but sufficient to give you a great start for the day.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location!!!”
Reviews.Author: secretbee
Reviews.Content: We just got back home after staying in this hotel for 4 nights. We had previously stayed here 5 years ago when it was still the Crowne Hotel and found its location on Orchard Road unbeatable since we spent most of the time in the shopping malls. We planned to do the same thing this year so we did our booking online. We were three adults so the hotel's location in the middle of the Orchard strip allowed us to go to different malls individually, depending on our own personal interests, and just meet up for meals or take a rest whenever we needed it. The best new malls are right beside or right across this hotel. Our room was small (deluxe) but it had very comfy beds and pillows. It did overlook a construction site but there was little noise that got in through the large window. The only thing that seemed amiss was that there was no cream provided for the free coffee and tea. And everytime we asked room service for some, it never came (happened twice). Very puzzling indeed. I once asked room service for some ice and a whole bucket was delivered promptly. So what's the problem with the cream??? The service people were courteous and attentive overall. My adult son had a great time relaxing in the pool and working out at the well-equipped gym. The bathroom was small but had everything we needed, with good quality toiletries included. I found the room too dark and the lighting too weak for reading in bed though. If only the lamp covers were transparent and white, instead of black, the room would look much less gloomy. I also didn't like the huge wallpaper of a model in a gown located on top of the headboard. Found it weird and spooky. We would stay in this hotel again mainly because of its great location.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location for shopping”
Reviews.Author: rooleyes
Reviews.Content: We stayed for just 2 nights at this hotel in a Crystal Club room. We picked the hotel for it's location being on Orchard Road, so very handy for shopping - it was a great choice for this purpose. The room was not large but well appointed and very clean. Again the bathroom was not large but help spotlessly clean. The Crystal Club lounge was very good - it was not large, but we only ever found a handful of people there when we visited. The staff in the lounge were excellent and couldn't do enough to help. We had breakfast in the lounge, and whilst the variety was limited, it was more than enough for what we required. One evening we had dinner in the main restaurant, and it was very good. Again the staff were very helpful and attentive. Overall we enjoyed our stay at the hotel, it suited our purpose for being able to get to the shops and back quickly. We had no issues getting a taxi from the hotel, so didn't experience the issues others have mentioned. No hesitation in returning to the hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay”
Reviews.Author: Blancs2008
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel in October 2011 for 3 nights. It was expensive however so were all the other hotels in this location. We were not disappointed. We were greeted with Verve Clicquot champagne on arrival and shown to our 'upgraded' room. It had all the creature comforts including ipod dock, amazing marble bathroom with both a rain shower and hose. The decor of the hotel was original and classy. Great location if you are wanting to hit the Orchard strip of shopping. The Paragon shopping centre across the road had a fabulous food court with loads of frech food which was made right in front of you. The Japanese place that has a guy making soba noodles in the window is to die for. So are the steamed dumplings from the Chinese place in the back corner which may chefs in the window dressed in white. And for dessert try the bread shop in particular the steam buns they were AMAZING!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best stays I have ever experienced!!”
Reviews.Author: Eamon07
Reviews.Content: An absolutely incredible stay! The Crystal Club Lounge is a must experience for this hotel. I arrived for a short 2 night stopover on the way to Perth, Australia from Dublin, Ireland. Lets just say this hotel had everything!! Location is incredible, a stone's throw away from all shopping centres. Service was one of the best I have ever experience thanks to everyone at the Crystal Club Lounge who were fantastic... A special mention to Fahim and Alam who were incredible. Accommodating in every single way! They were a pleasant to have around and made my stay very enjoyable :-) The Grand Park Orchard will definitely be my first choice stay when I come back to Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “''good location for shoppers''”
Reviews.Author: ERTUG777
Reviews.Content: Have stayed in many hotels on the Orchard Road and I can say this one deserves the money you pay. Make the booking online , it is safe and easy , ask for upgrade to a premier room so now you have a nice room for 2 people + free wi-fi ( which is working very good ) and free breakfast (very nice open buffet ) all included . Of course the location ,very close to shopping malls like Paragon , Takashimaya , ion and others. Even if you are not visiting Singapore for shopping you can use the MRT lines which are very close to go where ever you want. The room service is very good , the staff is helpful , the bar .the pool ,the gym center all ok. The main idea here is you have to pay min.100 usd extra per day to other 4-5 star hotels on the Orchard Road for all of the above. Taxi fare is around 10-12 sgd to the Marina Bay , Sentosa island or Clarke Quay . Go to Cova in Paragon shopping mall first floor for a very good cappuccino and fresh deserts when you need to take a break from shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Great location but...”
Reviews.Author: Singapore_trav
Reviews.Content: Ok, it's in the heart of Singapore's iconic shopping belt but the rooms are small, the aircon not effective and the flat screen tv faulty. We took the club room which meant access to the club floor. But we discovered the buffet breakfast is far better at the main restaurant on the 4th floor. Overall, an ok stay though we felt other hotels nearby might have been a better bet.

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location!”
Reviews.Author: Chrin
Reviews.Content: Like the title implies--LOCATION of this hotel is great. It's central to the Orchard shopping area, which was perfect for our needs. Just step out of the hotel and you're in the center of all the big malls--Paragon immediately across, Takashimaya/Ngee Ann City diagonally across, Wisma Atria and Ion Malls within just 5 minutes (and ergo the MRT). Location was important for us this trip since I'm pregnant, and when I'd get tired I could easily head to the hotel while the hubby continues exploring. Hotel itself was quite nice. Rooms were newly renovated--very modern, clean, and comfortable. Standard hotel room amenities were all there--toiletries, terry robe, hairdryer, in-room iron. Bottled water was complementary and replenished daily. Wi-fi was free and fast enough (for emailing and browsing). All the staff we encountered (from front desk, to resto, to doormen), were friendly and helpful. There was an inviting pool and gym, which we didn't get to use. The breakfast buffet included in our rate had ample choices for us (egg station, cold and hot food options, dimsum, cereals and breads). There's a little thing that proved a big plus for me--I was able to print out our boarding passes for free! I know it's a small thing, but it really irritates me when hotels charge for little things like printing on a piece of paper. So kudos, Grand Park Orchard!

Reviews.Title: “great location - crystal club floor not worth it”
Reviews.Author: smurdy24
Reviews.Content: If your heading to Singapore for shopping then this hotel is perfect for you, just steps away from some of the best shopping Orchard Road has to offer. Charles & Keith anyone?! There's about 3 of them located within a 1km radius :) plus tones of other great shops, restaurants and cafes. We upgraded to a crystal club floor room because there were 3 of us staying in the room. Unfortunately I have to say we were a little disappointed in the size of the room. It was quite small, defiantly not big enough for 3 people. (Lucky we were all close friends) Also when we arrived only a double bed was in the room, so we had to wait for someone to bring in a roll away bed, something which we would have expected been done prior to us arriving in the room. The breakfast on the Crystal Club floor is nothing to rave about, not much of a selection to choose from. We excpected a bit more on offer. The breakfast area on the 4th floor (where all the other hotel guests go who aren't on the Club floor go) looked like it had a better range. I coudln't really see what was so good about being on the Club Crystal floor compared to a standard floor. I would say save your money and spend it in some of the shops along Orchard ;) Also there are no power points in the bathrooms so if you want to blow-dry or straighten your hair you have to do it out where the mini-bar and mirror is located. (hard for 3 girls to share) The iron in our rooms was broken and we requested a new one, which we never received. The air-conditioning stopped working half way through one of the nights we were there, and with 3 bodies in a confined space - it got pretty hot and stuffy. Luckily the workman was able to fix it. All 3 of us found the beds very hard and uncomfortable. On the last night there I woke up with a sore neck and back. I know I sound like I'm whining a lot but my friends who stayed in the room had the same opinions so it's only fair we share them with others. I really wanted to love this hotel, and prior to arriving I was quite excited. But after staying there I'm a little disappointed. Maybe I set my expectations too high.

Reviews.Title: “Stylish, good standard, great attitude of staff.”
Reviews.Author: bethnyman
Reviews.Content: Very pleasant stay. All amenities are a good standard and the room was lovely. The food and service are excellent and the staff could not do enough. The location is great - just near all the Orchard Rd action. I will definitely be coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Very Centrally Located Boutique Hotel on Orchard”
Reviews.Author: civetta11
Reviews.Content: A lovely new boutique hotel directly across form Paragon Mall and surrounded by endless high end shops of Orchard Road. Check-in was very good, the Front Office staff were friendly and offered a genuinely warm welcome. I was allocated a room on the 9th floor, my window looks out to the lit up 'Gucci' logo from the store across the hotel. Rooms are very dark, so probably not so suitable if you are going there on business and need to work from your hotel room. Having said that, they have a very good Business Centre on the lobby floor which is free to use. Right opposite that there is a very happening lounge/ bar next to the hotel pool. The hotel restaurant is of quite a good standard, breakfast there provides a good start to the day with efficient, courteous service.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel spoilt by all the noise”
Reviews.Author: ShaunScotland
Reviews.Content: While checking in we were offered an up grade to a better room for an extra $50 Singa. We accepted and soon regreted it. We were given a room right on the corner of the hotel which was next to the huge TV advertising which faces orchard road. The room was huge and well equipped with a bath and rainforest shower and top quality fixtures and fittings. We have no problem with the fixtures and fittings it was the noise outside that caused all the problems. The shopping centre next door blasts out advertisment jingles from early until 2330hrs, it was so loud that we could not hear certain channels on our TV, which has a restricter fitted to the volume. The hotel does have double glazing but it is not up to the job. Once the next door noise finished, I realised that the large advertisement on the Grand Park also had speakers which "dronned on" even longer. In the end I had to sleep with my spare ear plugs which I had left over from the formula one. To make matters worse the other end of the hotel has a huge construction site next door. Due to being un able to get a good nights sleep I would not stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Profiterole
Reviews.Content: This hotel is all about location. We chose it because of its location on Orchard and it didn't disappoint. It's next to paragon shopping and takashimaya, and a short walking distances to all the shopping complexes on Orchard. The price was also slightly cheaper than the other hotels in the same area. We previously stayed at the mandarin meritus which is opposite the grand park orchard, but i prefer the grand park orchard. Also there is always a taxi in front of the hotel to take you to other places. This hotel was also less than 10 mins drive from universal studios and the taxi ride only cost about 15 sing dollars. We didn't try the food at the hotel because it was quite expensive. But not to worry. There is plenty to eat in Paragon next door and in Takashimaya (big shopping mall). Din Tai fung is an excellent dumpling restaurant right next door in Paragon shopping mall, along with other good restaurants. There is also a place called crystal jade in Takashimaya which offers excellent chinese food. For breakfast, there was a gloria jean's opposite hotel which had nice coffee and bakery stuff. There is also a convenience store adjacent to the hotel to buy snacks and drinks. We didn't get to test drive all aspects of the services. But the check in was fast and efficient, and the porter was reasonably quick to deliver the luggages to our room. The interior design of the hotel is modern and clean looking. The only negative thing i would say about this hotel is that the room is a bit small and the bathroom was even smaller! If you are in Singapore, we would recommend eating chilli crab or pepper crab at this place called Jumbo. It was absolutely yummy.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great position”
Reviews.Author: Monika152
Reviews.Content: We very impressed with hotel. Not cheap but couldn't fault anything. On arrival the gentleman at reception was very friendly, gave us an upgrade (without asking). The room wasn't small (as stated by other reviewers). The bathroom was a good size and very clean. It was very handy to lots of shopping. We had a very pleasant 2 nights stopover on way to London.

Reviews.Title: “NOT a hotel for Family”
Reviews.Author: shane l
Reviews.Content: Firstly the staff were fantastic except 1. I have stayed in many hotels, this is not a hotel for a family of 3. Booked a triple room, it had 2 single beds and another single bed was wheeled in later! Very,very tiny room. Extremely disappointed, smallest room ever stayed in, even £25 Premier Inn rooms are bigger Complained about it and the duty manager allowed my family and in-laws in the next room to have a late check-out. Double checked it in the morning and only one room had been booked for late check out, so had to go back up to level 6 to move all bags into 1 room. Not worth the money and would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Club Room too small, overall good service”
Reviews.Author: Mariko_Yogi
Reviews.Content: I booked a Club Room through the internet to celebrate my husband's birthday and our anniversary. The price at SGD400 was not too bad, until we checked into the rooms. We were very surprised to find indeed the rooms are very very small for a Club Room. The attached bathroom was worse. Too small for 2 people to be inside. It made me don't feel like using the bathroom at all. It's more like a boutique hotel i would say. The only good thing is that you can access to Club floor evening cocktails and tea time. The tea time is nothing, but the cocktail is good if you drink. If not, i don't think its really worth it to pay 400 for the Club Room. For breakfast, we chose to have it at the lobby instead of the club floor. Breakfast was ok, the spread nothing much to rave about, anyway its a 4 star hotel, what can you expect. But to a little disappointment, my husband had a food poisoning shortly after that. Lasted for 2 days. Hopefully not due to the breakfast... as i did not have it. The pro is that the service is really good and prompt. Friendly and helpful staffs. The con will be the room size and the construction noise that is going on opposite the building, which continued until bout 9pm? When we made the booking, we stated that we are celebrating birthday and anniversary, and requested for a room away from the elevator. But i guess these requests were not looked into. Nothing special was done (expected something due to paying Club room price) and was given a room right next to elevator. I would like other hotels if i am back again.

Reviews.Title: “Sad but true”
Reviews.Author: Volatile75
Reviews.Content: Many things went wrong for this stay: the porters didn't smile because they were busy hauling bags up the 4-5 flight of stairs at the entrance. They seemed overworked. Check in was flawless though. The design of the shower area was weird because after using the overhead shower, the floor near the sink always got really wet. I ordered room service and asked for a itemized copy which the staff didn't want to give but finally did unhappily. During breakfast, I asked for hard boiled eggs but the staff gave me 3/4 boiled ones. Overall, this hotel could have done better.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, location & staff.”
Reviews.Author: Razzi-B
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very nice & functional. The hotels location is perfect for exploring, shopping & working in Singapore. The staff are exceptionally friendly, professional & helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Top Service , top location”
Reviews.Author: target008
Reviews.Content: Stayed for two nights. Paid the extra $50 per night (on special) for the Crystal Club upgrade. Worth every penny. The room was better, free breakfast , afternoon tea and evening drinks, 2 bits of free laundry and a late check out. A couple of tips though. If you use the upgrade the breakfast laid out can be supplemented with eggs of your choice ( did not realise this until after) , and you can order a specific coffee type at no extra cost. Anad and Hussain ( sorry if I haven't spelt these right), the two Suite butlers also manage the crystal club - great guys , very welcoming and friendly. The pool area is outstanding. The front desk was the most cheerful I have encountered in a long time.

Reviews.Title: “You pay for the location”
Reviews.Author: gohl
Reviews.Content: Plus - location is very central, on Orchard Road, between Orchard MRT and Somerset MRT. - Very friendly reception and overall service is excellent. - Power sockets are have international adaptor built-in. A BIG convenience for travellers who forget their adaptors! - Free wi-fi!! A bit confusing to identify which of the multitudes of wifi's to connect to though. If it is written somewhere would make life a lot easier. - Daily newspaper delivered to your door. They have a special holder for the paper outside the door so don't expect it underneath your door! Minus - No fresh air. Windows are sealed. And if you manage to open them it is consctruction site if you look down. It is car park if you look across. Because of the angel of the room to window, it is a building's black glass window if you look from your bed. - Lighting is dim. The room I had had windows facing another building. Also there is no light above the luggage rack. Looking for items in the bag becomes a challenge. - Bathroom is damp and smells mouldy. This is probably due to design as I could see a damp patch in the corner of the floor and bath tub, which serves as the shower place as well. - Breakfast (buffet) is not something so appetising to look forward to. Coffee is terrible.

Reviews.Title: “Good & nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: dnadinna11
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Grand Park Orchard from 19th until Aug 21st. I stayed on level nine and found the hotel staff to be polite, accommodating and just excellent to deal with. Simply the best service when it comes to customer service by the bellboys in this hotel. Azmi is a service oriented individual, fast and ready to help out. Remember your name and treats everyone with respect and courtesy. The facilities here are what you would expect, excellent. The rooms are great, great gym, and nice outdoor bar. I can say nothing bad about the food at the Open House. Overall service is satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: “Stop searching....just book the Grand Park Orchard!”
Reviews.Author: Lisa B
Reviews.Content: Where do I start? I spend hours poring over every little detail on these reviews and hotel sites...don't waste any more time...just book Grand Park Orchard! The Grand Park Orchard is THE place to stay when in Singapore. We travel very often and were so delighted with the hotel, facilities, location, and most importantly, the staff. Nothing was too much trouble. We definitely recommend you splurge a little on the Crystal Club rooms - we also upgraded our daughter on arrival for just $50 per night extra (promotion)...and then they upgraded her again to a Premium room...so worth it! Breakfast, afternoon tea, evening cocktails & canapes with Veuve Cliquot free flowing! The Crystal Club Lounge staff were incredible...Susan (who knew EVERY club, bar and attraction worth seeing in Singapore), Hashim (??) hope I spelt it correctly, Tina, Nora Lynn, Sammi, Alam....all were just great and made our stay so memorable. Room service prompt and excellent. Room was immaculate, as was everywhere in the hotel. Slick decor...loved the Bar Canary! We will DEFINITELY stay here next time we visit Singapore and recommend to all our friends and colleagues. Thanks again guys!

Reviews.Title: “My personal favorite”
Reviews.Author: GastroAficionado
Reviews.Content: This is my personal favorite, it's new and hip. It's slap bang in the middle of Orchard madness--perfect for short stays (and SHOPPING). It looks and feels super high-end but affordable! The actual rooms are smaller than the photos online (as ALWAYS), don't count on the views, you're in the middle of Orchard shopping centers and the room is pretty enough to eliminate the need to look outside ;) I stayed in the premier room, pretty interior--modern/minimalist with up-to-date facilities. The room has an iPod dock which is pretty awesome since most hotels don't. Room size is OK. Everything is nice BUT there is one thing that makes the room seem a little AWKWARD; on top of the bed, there's a 'mural' of pretty models in wavy dresses--seems like something out of magazines. It's the only downside of the rooms and the 'mural' is pretty big. So just beware of the [almost life-size] pretty models on the wall above your bed--doesn't cater to everyone's liking. So, AWESOME & hip hotel with the perfect location for shoppers and Orchard road hoppers (like me) ;) affordable--great value! Cool bars, lounges, pool, facilities, the whole place just looks trendy expensive and high end. The only downside is the huge murals in the rooms. It might just be me to find it awkward but be sure to check photos out online!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Shoppers”
Reviews.Author: major_grubert
Reviews.Content: Conveniently located in the thick of things on a particularly busy stretch of Orchard Road (Ngee Ann City and Paragon are only a minute's walk away - those looking for a bit less hassle might instead consider the area around the Hilton and Orchard Parade) it's well-nigh impossible to fault this hotel: think gleaming hallways, a courteous and attentive staff and rooms that come fully equipped with every sort of amenity imaginable, from blowdryers to built-in plug adapters and ipod/iphone docks. So why the 4-star rating? Simply because the hotel did not in any way exceed my expectations. What else would you expect from a place that looks like something directly out of the pages of Wallpaper magazine, a place that at the end of the day isn't all that different from all the other hundreds of places frequented by corporate suits? Then, of course, there are the rates. Make no mistake, it's a damn pricey option. But then again, Singapore is a damn pricey place.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location and the Crystal Floor!”
Reviews.Author: birdseyeGeelong
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this fantastic hotel for 3 nights on our way to Thailand in late July 2011. The room met our expectation but really set this hotel apart for us was the outstanding service. We booked a Superior Room which wasn't cheap but on arrival decided to update to a room on the Crystal Club Floor. This turned out to be a very, very good decision. Room size is about the same as the Superior one but the upgrade (they had a special on) gave us the following advantages: Meeting and lounge facilities Buffet breakfast of very good quality Afternoon tea option from 3 - 5pm Cocktail session 5.30 - 7.30 pm (beer, wine and spirits and excellent appetizers Two items of laundry washed and pressed Drinks are very pricey at hotels in Singapore with meals eg a standard beer is $15-$18 (AUS) so the upgrade more than paid for itself! Compliments in particular to Susan - front of house in the Crystal Club Room - what an asset that lady is to the hotel. My wife and I were delighted to chat to her as she went about serving us in impeccable style. Truly an outstanding personality and for us a standout amongst a very professional team - who personalise to meet individual needs. I wonder why the mixed reviews for the Grand Park Orchard but we did note two very difficult customers in our 4 days at the hotel that no manner of excellence would please! Good work also to Beverage Manager Rory, obviously a very experienced operator who explained the pricing structure of drinks in a manner much appreciated by me. This hotel is going in all the right directions - well done Grand Park Orchard - we'll be back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and central location, overall pleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: lil_ruski
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed two nights in this hotel, here some things I liked and disliked about the place. Plus: Hotel is located very conveniently for shopping and staff were very helpful in helping us with what to see in a short period of time. Free internet was great too. Rooms are very modern and clean. Minus: Rooms are quite small, we have booked a deluxe king room but I think we were given a queen, did not make an issue out of it but was expecting more that I got. Another small annoying part was having to take two lifts to get to your room (one from the street to level 4 - reception, and than cross to the other side to get to the lifts going up to rooms). Overall, if you are in looking for a nice place to stay close to the shops, this is definitely worth considering.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, pleasant staff and overall good hotel”
Reviews.Author: kaotic363
Reviews.Content: The main attraction for trying out this particular hotel was the price considering the hotel's location. We stayed in a executive level room and the room was pretty good although a bit of a weird smell (perhaps smoked in previously). All in all the hotel suited us just fine and close to all the major shopping areas. The staff on the executive floor were quite nice although a bit to eager to please which annoyed us a bit. Not easy to enjoy your breakfast when the staff wants to chat it up with you the whole time.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recomended”
Reviews.Author: PPMSSM
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after a 2 nights stay in Marina Bay Sands. We love every detail. The free Wifi , the bath , the SERVICE, the location! Right in the heart of orchard, what more could one ask for!

Reviews.Title: “Super - for a three night stay !”
Reviews.Author: AquaAngel
Reviews.Content: This is not the St. Regis, Shangri-La or the Fullerton, so don't expect that to begin with ! However, this is a superbly located business hotel if a short stay for work or shopping is what you have planned for Singapore. Alam and Hashim were outstanding at the Club Lounge ! Susan gave us an upgrade after a hiccup at check-in which was highly appreciated by us. The room was compact, but a side-view of the Paragon with a mammoth Gucci signage lit against the orange glow of the setting sun and interjected with diagonal sections of the hotel facade was quite a composition ! The breakfast had a reasonably good selection to choose from and I have to mention that they serve a good quality Chardonnay during the cocktail hour ! Overall, this is great hotel with very friendly and genuinely helpful service. Singapore is a tad bit expensive, so a hotel like the Grand Park Orchard does not come cheap, though I personally think that it is great value for money. I like to stay either in boutique hotels or high-end properties, but sometimes the hustle and bustle of a busy hotel in the middle of a busy city can also be a good change... The Mandarin Gallery shopping center is lovely and is on your left when you step out. Atomi was a stand-out store ! Lei Garden is just a few steps ahead where you can savor some delectable Cantonese fine-dining. The Ku De Ta at the Marina Bay Sands is worth a visit, but one visit only — unless the food, cocktails and service receive a major overhaul.

Reviews.Title: “Service was fast and efficient”
Reviews.Author: jamesryan99
Reviews.Content: Based on reviews from this and other websites, I booked a few night with Grand park Orchard to experience stay. So glad I did, as the location is perfect; shopping mall are walking distance, easy for me to get things and stuff. Staff of Grand Park Orchard were friendly, professional and accommodating with a great can-do attitude. They try to anticipate your every needs. Especially a great THANK YOU dedicate to staff Azmi who really help me during the departure. Keep up the good work! Looking forward in the near future staying in Grand Park Orchard..

Reviews.Title: “Excellent , but....”
Reviews.Author: lub0
Reviews.Content: It is not my first trip, hopefully not last to Singapore.First time in this hotel, and reason ( Singapore on sale ) , probably the best place to stay on Orchard road if your wife is shopoholic. But ? be carefull there is lot of building activity particularly at the rear of the hotel . Ask for higher floors...

Reviews.Title: “Five star”
Reviews.Author: billy003
Reviews.Content: I was really looking forward to my stay here with my mum and baby, and the hotel definitely didn't disappoint. The staff truly are amazing. From the friendly doormen to the staff who press the lift buttons for you so you don't have to wait even a second for the lifts to arrive. But particularly it's the people in the Crystal Club Lounge - Alam, Susan and Hashim. Their warmth, professionalism and willingness to help is amazing. I had read numerous reviews about the hotel on trip advisor, and was a little concerned about some of the things people had mentioned before I arrived. Rest assured that my experience was 100% positive (okay, maybe housekeeping didn't have amazing attention to detail, but they still made our rooms tidy and clean each day). I understand that the hotel takes their feedback very seriously, so they have possibly made some tweaks since opening last year. Don't bother looking anywhere else to stay in Singapore. Grand Park Orchard is simply divine. Oh & if you book the Crystal Club rooms you get Verve champagne every day (included in the rate).

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: pepperchip
Reviews.Content: I loved the location which was i the middle of Orchard Rd. The lobby on the 4th floor smelled great. Rooms clean and spacious. I particularly loved the gradual incline of the floors which made walking in and out easier and faster and less tiring.

Reviews.Title: “Best butler ever!”
Reviews.Author: Noren17
Reviews.Content: Much has been written about the hotel, so I need not add to the compliments on its excellent location n value. However I'd like make special mention of mr alam albahar whose name card states his position at the club floor lounge as 'butler'. However, he seems to be much more than that. He exudes charm, confidence, experience and is a friend to his guests, as suggested by the response of the guests when they walk into the lounge. The few times I was there it was clear that he was very professional in his role and is an excellent example of what service is about. The younger staff should take a leaf from his book. The likes of mr albahar are rare these days.

Reviews.Title: “A Pleasant Stay”
Reviews.Author: 5Star-er
Reviews.Content: Plus: Very nice & helpful staffs (doorman, bell boy, receptionist, room service, housekeeper, restaurant waiter/ss & concierge) and great location (near Ngee Ann City, Takashimaya, Wisma Atria, Tang Plaza & Paragon).. Minus: Weak WiFi network.. Overall: Looking forward to stay in this hotel again..

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Hotel - It's a mix of boutique and mass. I like homely feel.”
Reviews.Author: Luxique
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 1 night. The furnishings of the hotel are not as good as I expected from the way they portray the image to be. But nonetheless, the layout and space of the room is good. Food can be further improved - one can see they put in a lot of effort in differentiating themselves from the big boys - especially the Mandarin Hotel which is just opposite them. I especially like their Poolside Bar - it's equally good on a day or night, except that when it rains, the entire bar is wasted as there is no good shelter for it. The management should seriously consider a good stylish shelter so that guests like us can continue to enjoy the outdoor bar.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Place!!”
Reviews.Author: d3gadc
Reviews.Content: I stayed on the Club Floor and enjoyed exclusive check in, breakfast and evening cocktails in the club lounge area. Susan and Alan (the Maitre d'hotel?) were fantastic to chat to and really looked after me. I had a complex schedule checking in very early one morning flying out the next and returning a couple of days later and nothing was too much trouble. The location is perfect for the shopping area., Ngee Ann City is 2 minutes walk away, the outdoor pool made a great start to each day and the accommodation was very comfortable. There were also families there enjoying the facilities and I'll be returning with my wife and children at the next opportunity! I'd strongly recommend the Grand Park Orchard, book online for the best rates!

Reviews.Title: “All style, no substance”
Reviews.Author: FrequentTraveller_xy
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel to be particularly bad given that it's brand new. Staff seem very poorly trained; hotel doors dont latch themselves closed; a ridiculous lift system where you have to take one lift to the lobby and then change to another on the other side of the lobby to get to your room; amenities (and lightbulbs) that werent checked/maintained properly etc etc. Location is great, but there are much better hotels in Singapore for the same price

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location but Housekeeping staff needs Service training”
Reviews.Author: BKP_SINGY
Reviews.Content: Great location, right on Orchard road. For some reasons, lighting in rooms is quite dim, not well ventilated. Housekeeping is in bad shape, extremely slow and often forget to get the stock the guest rooms well.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: AbbsG
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel through booking.com mostly due to the location and didn't expect too much due to mixed reviews. I couldnt believe the luxury of Grand Park Orchard when we arrived there. Extremely modern both internally and externally. Location was unbelievable, perfect for a few days of shopping (or just the one night of shopping as it was for us) and the shopping was great - about 25% cheaper than at AU, or even cheaper when you get the GST back. I'd definitely return to Singapore and stay at Grand Park Orchard.

Reviews.Title: “Totally 5 star and well worth the Money”
Reviews.Author: makita_1011
Reviews.Content: Great location on Orchard road, plenty of shops restaurants nearby all easy walking. Staff in the Club Lounge could not be more pleasant - always wanting to help and assist with anything. Very friendly staff throughout the entire hotel. Rooms are very clean and spacious. recommend this hotel to families, couples and business travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Modern and Great location on Orchard Road”
Reviews.Author: aruboy
Reviews.Content: We wanted a hotel for one night on route to Europe, happy I selected this hotel. We arrived late in the afternoon, John at reception did the best job in making us feel welcome.
