Upgraded to a better room on higher level. Everything was clean and Modern. Room not huge but comfortable with the very best bed with blackout curtains. Cocktails at the Canary bar a treat in the Singapore heat. We were given free breakfasts, late check out and everything we could ask for nothing was a problem for the staff at this hotel. We arrived the first day of Singapore on Sale and my wife took to this at pace as everything was less that 100 meters away. Remember Singapore can be hot so have a look for the below ground shopping malls. We did not eat dinner at the hotel but went to a Hawkers market for Chili crab. A 10 minute walk from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “BEST LOCATED HOTEL IN SINGAPORE”
Reviews.Author: GauravVGoyal
Reviews.Content: Simply the best located hotel in singapore, no arguments! Very expensive breakfast and tiny rooms is the problem though, Takashimaya on one side and paragon on the other, wow..Would recommend tired husbands shopping for their wives as they can simply hop back across in a jiffy

Reviews.Title: “Will recommend to friends”
Reviews.Author: tptuason
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the 11th floor called the Crystal Club. The rooms are rather small but all the amenities are there. Check in and check out , breakfast, afternoon tea, and early evening cocktails all at the same floor, all included in the room rates. Special mention to the Butler Mr. Alam Albahar who makes you feel very welcome. He even went out of his way to take us and our bags to the 1st floor and hail us a cab going to the airport. The rates are a bit pricey but worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly & Convenient”
Reviews.Author: geebes2
Reviews.Content: Just had a quick business trip to Singapore for 2 nights. Grand Park Orchard was ideally located, right in the middle of Orchard road. Checking in/out was no problem, plenty of friendly staff around to help. The room is modern, bathroom elegant, wifi, tv etc all good. Restaurant had superb food, really enjoyed my stay and good value compared to other Orchard hotels. My only grumble was that there was no electric shaver point in the bathroom, so I had to shave either over the tea service, or in a corner with no mirror. Overall, I would go back again, wished I'd had time to lay by the pool and order cocktail, as it looked a nice relaxing area !

Reviews.Title: “Great Grand Park Orchard Hotel”
Reviews.Author: K0ner
Reviews.Content: We are really enjoyed with our stay in Grand Orchard.The hotel is very modern and nearly furbished with modern decoration.It is very central and it is right in the hearth of main tourist attractions and shopping malls. The hotel staff is very friendly,The rooms are very clean.The only negative point is its price as it is in little bit highside comparing to same hotel nearby. but it is worth paying it.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay at Crystal Club Room”
Reviews.Author: fenghuo
Reviews.Content: For a short staycation, decided to check in into Grand Park Orchard as we knew that it was recently refurbished from the goerm Crown Hotel at Orchard. We decided to give the club room a try, as it seemed quite affordable. We were not disappointed. There was personalised check in on Level 11, where the service staff extruded warm service with a smile, offering us a late check-out immediately the next day for 3pm. This was subsequently extended to 4pm on the day of departure, even though we did not request for it. Staff was very forthcoming in their service, including the butler Mr Alam Albahar who was proactive to ask whether we would be interested in looking at the suites available. Breakfast at the club floor was unhurried, even though the spread is fairly limited. You do get the option to have it at Open House, the restaurant at Level 4, though we opted the club lounge for the quietness. Evening cocktails etc at the lounge was similarly quieter, which is a much more enjoyable affair compared to some other lounges of bigger hotels. Rooms were on a small size, with a more peculiar painting of a lady dressed in purple on the wall. However the furnishings were all very tasteful, and we have a relaxing time. Location wise, definitely a plus as it is right smacked in the heart of Orchard Rd.

Reviews.Title: “A REAL PLEASANT STAY!”
Reviews.Author: tiongengming
Reviews.Content: My husband was on business, me and my two girls were on vacation. We stayed 5 nites on the crystal club floor, the butlers Hashim, Alam N staff N also front desk Susan really made us feel so warm, comfortable and welcome. We just met but talked like old friends.They are real gems in hospitalities industry.Thank you very much guys. we adults and also the two girls really enjoyed the quiet drinks and snacks in the evening before dinner. Generally, the staff in the hotel are very friendly, it is also very centrally located, very convenient, value for money. Will definitely stay again on our next visit. By Mrs Leong

Reviews.Title: “Modern ID, fantastic location, good size rooms & value”
Reviews.Author: shockl
Reviews.Content: - Smooth check-in and bell service/assistance was prompt and accurate - Good size, very modern rooms and bathrooms - Small issue with shower (hand-shower doesn't allow for tilt and rainshower continues dripping for a while after turning off) - Small leak around WC area (not sure if it's from WC though) but wasn't enough of a problem to raise a complaint - All expected amenities are there (e.g. slippers, robes, toiletries etc) and the pool/ bar area is attractive enough Overall, at the rate we paid (about S$300), it's quite good value for a Singaporean 4-star deluxe hotel in very best location . Will return again.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”
Reviews.Author: MadiJorja
Reviews.Content: I have never complained about a hotel before, but the service at the Grand Park Orchard was appalling. Upon arrival the receptionist was confused about the rooms we were getting, we were told it was two rooms with the lounge in the middle. When we got to our rooms I had a disabled room and my friend a normal one. I asked if I could swap rooms and was told the hotel was full. I attempted to have a shower in the disabled bathroom, the bathroom turned into a swimming pool and i couldn't shower probably because of the disabled seat. The handle also fell off in the shower, but I managed to repair it. I asked for new towels twice to try and mop up the mess the shower made. When I went to bed there were red spots on my sheets, I pulled it back and there was blood marks over the mattress protector (it was simply gross). I rung up and got the manger, who then moved me to a new room. This room was above the bar which had a function on, it was so noisy and there were people talking with microphones. I rung again and asked if there was a quieter room. I was informed they would call me back. I never heard back from them at all. The next day my wardrobe doors got stuck and I couldn't get into my safe or clothes. This was fixed though. I was then locked out of my room and had to get a new card. To top it all off when we checked out we had to pay for our breakfast again. We had originally paid cash for it to get rid off some of our singapore money. They had no record of it and so we paid again. I would never stay at this hotel again, however it was in a really nice hotel, fantastic location and clean. The service was just dreadful.

Reviews.Title: “will think about it . ..”
Reviews.Author: ernest80
Reviews.Content: got to the hotel at 4.30 pm. And couldn't believe that upon check it, the front desk told me that our 2 rooms are not ready until 5.30-6.00 pm due to their full-house occupancy the previous night before. Frankly , who cares about their stupid reason and its absolutely stupid to tell me they can't give me my rooms because they were full-house last night (which is not my problem)..!!!!! so i am not as important as the customers who stayed over the previous night so i deserved to wait and to be put onhold??,how silly! !! what i wanted was , what i had booked and had planned for. It was fortunately that i have no other meetings or dinner on the particular night, or else it might have just ruined my plans.And to my unbelievable as i next walked out to the onyx bar hoping for a drink while waiting for my room to be ready , there were absolute NO ONE at the bar . So i have to walked out get down to the streets to find my own place to chill. On my way out, i saw a reception and asked if their bar is open and to my surprised she say "yes" but i told her there is no one there and i have waitied for 5 minutes !!! then she told me , she can get someone there now..!!! WTH ! =_= Beside that, during my stay in the hotel, the cleaner tried to open my door twice !!! once was when i was still sleeping.. ! and the other was while i was in the loo. I might not have put on my "do not disturb" sign. But i clearly yield "yes i am in the room" while they rang my bell !! and yet the stupid lady still enter my ROOM WITH HER own key card !!! Other than that, the rooms are new and clean . BUt their services sucks BIG time , their management are just SO incompetent compared other International Standard hotels like ritz,starwood, hyatt... just don't expect too much from this hotel apart from a DECENT ROOM to spent the night. And for that money i am paying.. i'll live else where!

Reviews.Title: “LOVE THIS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: bfkillow
Reviews.Content: Nora was excellent in attending to all our needs when we stayed in Siingapore on a business trip, the stafff generally were very helpful and friendly

Reviews.Title: “Good bed, and easy.”
Reviews.Author: bongkeh
Reviews.Content: I was facing trouble when I just reach at 11pm. none in the ground floor. means no bellboy, no concierge, none. I dont even have any idea, how am I going to carry all my luggage alone. and where is the check in place? so its happen a cleaner who's cleaning the cigarettes butts points up her finger and shows 4 finger. means its at the 4th floor. okai. so I was dragging my heavy luggage alone, and there's only two staffs on the 4th floor. I do tell one of the guy, and he simple says " apologize". and finally they offered me to help me with my luggage. why now, why not from just now? the reception ladies, knows Im requesting for late check out, which is attentive. hotel room is smaller than mandarin. but hey, if you ever stay in the orchard tower of the mandarin hotel, dont you think its troublesome and complicated for you just to reach the main orchard road? you need to walk here and there then finally you reach orchard road. this park hotel is closer and simpler for anyone to reach the orchard road. bed was very comfortable, more comfortable than orchard mandarin. check in and out was fast as well. room amenities was complete enough. not bad for the rate given, they should give a lil bit cheaper more than mandarin. buffet in this hotel is cheap as well. its a new hotel, so yeah, I'd understand, but im sure they could do better.

Reviews.Title: “Best Location in a New Hotel”
Reviews.Author: PhilippineTraveler
Reviews.Content: My whole family stayed in this newly refurbished hotel for 5 nights and we got 4 Crystal Club Rooms. Upon arrival, I presented my reservation confirmation in the reception and we were guided to the 11th floor, The Crystal Club Lounge, for our check-in process. Surprisingly, all my reservations were upgraded and we were given welcome drinks and food. The hotel is very clean and all the furnishings are new. Rooms: The rooms are a bit small than in other hotels in Singapore but is roomy enough and you wont feel that its a bit small. The bathroom is different - it is big and almost as big as the room. Club Lounge: The Lounge is not that big and has all the essential things you need. A business room, computer area, food and drinks. The service in the Club Lounge was EXCELLENT!!! In fact, if I could name what is the best with this hotel that the service that they give are great. Salute to all the staff in the Club Lounge and special mention to RHEA to her special attention to all our needs. Room Service: The room service was also good and fast even if you are just asking for a bucket of ice. Bar and Restaurant: The Bar and the Restaurants also offers a wide selection of drinks and as well as food. Housekeeping: This is the only downside in this hotel. I think this is were the hotel should improve. Although they make the rooms always clean, their service is not that good. Overall: This hotel is one of the great hotel I tried in Singapore. I will definitely stay here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best location midway in Orchard, new refurb hotel but standard isn't there yet”
Reviews.Author: soetantoa
Reviews.Content: Value is great for us as we paid half price during promo, location is the best as its smack bang in the middle of Orchard Great outdoor bar & their massage service is top notch, one of the best. Breakfast is lacking of variety as every single day is the same. They can learn from Royal Scott. Hotel staff is great & friendly but room service isn't consistent. We booked 3 rooms for 4 nights and all have different level of service each consecutive day, my bar fridge wasn't refilled and other rooms didn't get water bottle refilled, bathrooms amenities didn't get refilled. Whenever we turn off a/c our room will have cigarette odour & 1 of our 3 rooms can't get wi-fi signal. Bathroom fittings isn't up to 5 stars, loose toilet roll holder, broken bath overflow, botched-up fixing & fixtures. Their standard isn't up to 5 stars yet but they'll be there soon.

Reviews.Title: “Expensive for what you get!”
Reviews.Author: Bolly64
Reviews.Content: Even though hotel is in the heart of Orchard rd not many taxi drivers knew this place... Small rooms, poorly decorated, made us spend lot less time in the hotel and enjoyed More of Singapore. So why spend this sort of money if all you want is a good hotel with a clean bed.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel in perfect location”
Reviews.Author: t8adm
Reviews.Content: On a recent business trip to Singapore I stayed at this hotel, from the moment arrived to the time I left the staff could never do enough to help. rooms are excellent although I stayed at the club floor. rooms not big but perfect for what was required. the 2 butlers from the club floor lounge were extremely friendly , chatty and helpful Hashim Mohamed & Alam Albahar would make a point and coming back to this hotel on ym next visit.

Reviews.Title: “personal attention akin to a small boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: CorinR
Reviews.Content: Staying on the Crystal Club level adds a level of service & comfort that is welcomed as a solo traveler - from my check in (& out) with the very charming Noralynn who extended a much welcomed late check out to the attentive butlers Alam & Hashim who are both quick with their wit & charm as well as impeccable service. The included breakfast, afternoon tea & cocktail hour on the 11th floor almost covers every meal requirement but then it is Singapore & it'd be a sin not to explore further. The club floor provides a quiet & relaxed environment that is a welcome break.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: lh111981
Reviews.Content: very attentive, can't do enough to make you feel welcome and individual staff in crystal club, very pleasant stay, clean and quiet rooms, free laundry which is amazing and wonderful breakfasts. really made being away from home easy!

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: nn1234
Reviews.Content: i stayed a week at this hotel located along orchard rd. the service is excellent, specially at the crystal club. i admire the special attention by : ms nora lynn, miss sammi and mr alam. they are of big help to my stay. constantly adhering to my never ending needs. i will surely stay in this hotel again in the future. the only drawback is that the room could use a sofa set so that i can lay down some of my personal belongings. its a wonderful saty as a whole...

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but room was small and too basic”
Reviews.Author: vidursingal
Reviews.Content: The best point about this hotel is its location. The hotel is opposite Takashimaya and Paragon shopping malls. All the big brand names are within walking distance. So, if shopping is high on priority, then this hotel is perhaps the best place to stay. However, for the price the rooms were a disappointment. The was very small and equipped with basic amenities. You can not be blamed for expecting more from a five star hotel and for the price you are paying. Besides that dampener, the hotel was good and the staff is friendly and efficient. The breakfast was well served and good variety of foods.

Reviews.Title: “New Modern Hotel But Lacking 5Star Service”
Reviews.Author: DeborahMelbourne
Reviews.Content: We stayed at The Grand Park Orchard for 3 nights in a Premium Club Floor Room. The size of the rooms are very small as is the bathroom. Really only enough room for one person in the bathroom at a time. Service at the Club Floor Lounge could be a lot better. We only went once for afternoon tea and evening cocktails and had to ask to be served each time even though we were the only people in the lounge each time. Really lacking atmosphere. We regret paying for a Premium Club Floor Room and for that matter a Club Floor room as it was a complete waste. Really the only good thing about this hotel is its location.

Reviews.Title: “Superb Standards and Staff!”
Reviews.Author: chub_11
Reviews.Content: I stayed 2 weeks at this hotel and every single day was truly "Grand". The staff is so friendly and courteous and make you feel at home. The quality of the room and amenities - including the food and bar - were outstanding.

Reviews.Title: “nice, good location but quiet expensive.”
Reviews.Author: MIGGY17
Reviews.Content: I am Janine Aranza and I checked in three times in your hotel with my lover.. I did enjoy everything apart the room charged.. But nice to stay and romantic..

Reviews.Title: “Great location! Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The location is fabulous and right in the centre of shopping paradise, Orchard Road! All kind of food for ur stomach can be brought easily. The service at the Crystal Lounge is wonderful! Special mention are service staff, Mr Alam, Mr Hashim, Ms Noralyn and Ms Dua! We are so well taken care by them. They are warm people and delighted u once u stepped into the Crystal Lounge! The room is trendy and chic. But still feel strange why a large photo of a model put up on the wall.... Great place to stay to shop till u drop!

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: debsndave00
Reviews.Content: Good modern hotel.Super location bang in the centre of orchard road. Pleasant staff. Food i would rate as fair. Do ask for a room at the front of the hotel as the rear rooms have no view whatsoever. Overall a good experiance. Unfortunately, slightly pricey.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad but Not Great”
Reviews.Author: jingga18 Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Brand new hotel, very modern decor. A bit dark for me though. If location is your main concern, this is definitely the place for you. Great location for shopping. All the big brand names are within walking distance. Reception staff is a bit slow. I've been to other hotels in Singapore and they're generally very efficient. 2-3 people are always in front of 1 computer screen, serving 1 customer. Be aware of the tax surcharge applicable. We were aware of this when we made the reservation (it's in the fine print of the T&C). But we were still quite shocked at how much extra we had to pay. It made Grand Park not really worth the money we had to spend. From main entrance, you have to take an elevator to level 4 (the lobby), and then take a different elevator to your rooms. It can be a little bit annoying when you're in a hurry to leave the hotel or to go back to your rooms. Concierge staff is always on the alert to get you a cab. We never had a problem with getting a taxi despite the fact that this hotel does not have a taxi stand. All in all, not bad but not great.

Reviews.Title: “New, good location but a bit pricey”
Reviews.Author: ozmadmax
Reviews.Content: Good location for shopping / tourist, not so good for the business traveller as lots of competition for taxis and traffic during peak hours. Only opened in Oct/Nov so probably a few rough edges still need to be smoothed out. Friendly but not very efficient service. Business centre breakfast had limited choices but was adequate. Room decoration was a little too funky (wall mural would offend some people) and constuction site outlook didn't help. For a new hotel it was expensive and there is no incentive to stay there again as the price did not match any of the benefits that I would not get elsewhere at a higher standard or lower price for similar.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravelBug1081
Reviews.Content: Room was spacious with flatscreen LCD TV, electric kettle, iron and a mini fridge. Bed was queen sized and is comfortable. Cant say the same for the pillows. Pillows were flat and lumpy. Had difficulty sleeping throughout the night. Woke up in the morning with a crick in my neck. However, room was quiet with no street noise. Location of the hotel is great, just a few metres walk out of the hotel and you are on Orchard Road, Singapore's famous shopping district. Walk along Orchard Road and you will be spoilt for choice on things you wish to shop. Food is aplenty in the shopping malls and even on the side streets. It is easy to hail a cab (either at the concierge or taxi stand along Orchard Rd) and take the MRT train. ION Orchard has a MRT train station inside the mall. Would have enjoyed the hotel stay more had I stayed longer for leisure.

Reviews.Title: “Must be one of the Best in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: FarangBangkok
Reviews.Content: We have been travelling to Singapore at least twice a year for short breaks for over the last 5 years and fInally I have found a hotel in Singapore that treats me like a guest and not just another paying customer. From the time time of arrival to departure it is difficult to say anything negative about the hotel. The porters, reception staff, restaurant staff all treated us with respect and were ALL very helpful and polite. Free business centre, WiFi throughout the hotel added to the high standard. The rooms not spacious but more than adequate, clean, tidy, and serviced well. The view from the room was not good, but we did not go to Singapore to look out of the hotel window! Breakfast was included and was of a good standard, the restaurant was always busy but the staff maintained the service well. The location is perfect on Orchard Road, easy access to the MRT and plenty of shops for my wife to visit! The cost of hotel was reasonable given the time of year and its location, great value for money. We will definitely be using this hotel for our next trip.

Reviews.Title: “service could be friendlier”
Reviews.Author: jvu5
Reviews.Content: hotel is placed in a great location, right in the middle of orchard rd where you can shop to your hearts content. the service was below average, especially for a 5-star hotel. I am never one to be critical of the service provided in a hotel, however the service of this hotel definitely did not reach 5 -star standards. Rooms were not always cleaned daily, and on some days only the bed was made, and none of the towels were replaced. I have also once requested for toilet paper, and it took multiple requests and over 30 minutes of waiting for it to arrive. For it's price, it is however quite reasonable considering its location, it is also a new hotel so it might take some time for the service to get up to scratch.

Reviews.Title: “The Place to stay in Singapore..Great Location..Great Service”
Reviews.Author: vivinkurien
Reviews.Content: The best place to stay in Singapore..Awesome location.When the Orchard Road was lit up during the christmas week, we were able to enjoy it the most since the walk to the the Hotel from the Metro was simply fantastic(something we wouldnt have experienced otherwise). The nearness of the hotel to two Metro stations helped us to use them a lot and experience the Singaporean way of travellling and save a lot of money in the process too. Had breakfast during our stay at the Open House Restaurant, the food and the service was great.. Would for sure stay there again on my next trip to Singapore

Reviews.Title: “Brand spanking new modern hotel with comfort.”
Reviews.Author: 1whereintheworldami1
Reviews.Content: Nicely appointed comfortably sized rooms. A nice oasis from the busy orchard street below. Well suited for a business traveller wuth good work place in the room. There are nice views of orchard street from my room although because of the building design I did not feel like I was staying in a goldfish bowl. The bar balcony on the 4th floor was very relaxing. The bar also has a glass walled swimming pool that looked great.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, but the Musky Smell!”
Reviews.Author: TennisQuicky
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights in mid Nov, total of 4 guests for 2 rooms. The hotel is very modern, but maybe trying a little too hard to be trendy. The staff was attentive and professional enough. The location is just off of Orchard Rd and right across the street from Paragon Mall, so it's great if you are planning on shopping. There's an especially large concentration of high-end / luxury brands in this area. A bit difficult to cross the street to get to the mall though, since there is no designated pedestrian path directly in front of the hotel. Good breakfast selection with wide range of Asian and Western items. Internet service is room was included and pretty fast. The pool was nice and relatively large for a hotel right in the middle of town (Orchard Rd neighborhood at least). Now to the bad bits - the entrance lobby and the reception lobby reeked of a musky scent, similar to a bad cologne for men. It gave my girlfriend and me a headache every time we had to pass through them! Also, this hotel has one of my pet peeves, wherein you have to take an elevator to get to the reception desk. I like my reception desk on the ground level, but that's my personal preference. Also, the hallways were rather dark and not necessarily the cleanest. The rooms were dark as well with dark colored walls and furniture. Also there was picture of a female model on the wall directly above the bed (some, not me, might call it "art"), which my girlfriend didn't appreciate. I wouldn't mind having a word or two with the interior designer for this building. Also, the view (or lack thereof) from the rooms were pitiful, with very little sunlight coming through, which didn't help the darkness situation at all. Overall, I can't recommend the place until they fix the smell in the lobbies and the dark rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel - Great Location”
Reviews.Author: ashishvb
Reviews.Content: Centrally located on the Orchard Road, the Grand Park Orchard is a fantastic hotel to book a room in. I was on a business trip and had very little time in the evenings to roam around. The location of the hotel made it very easy for me to see the place and also do some shopping. The planning of the hotel interior though is a bit confusing till you get used it. This though is not really a problem as the rooms a very good. The restaurant is excellent and probably the best breakfast I have ever had in any hotel anywhere. The hash-browns are exceptionally good. I'd certainly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Singapore on business.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, nice rooms, friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: lynWollongong
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Grand Park Orchard for 4 nights while in Singapore on a business trip from 19-23 October 2010. The location would have to one of the best in Singapore, right in the centre of Orchard Road with endless shopping malls and eateries. The hotel had it's official opening only 9 days earlier and for a brand new property the staff were very organised and helpful. I stayed in a deluxe room which wasn't large but was very well appointed and tastefully decorated. Free wifi in the room was a bonus. The foyer, pool area and restaurant are very modern and classy. Check in and check out was seamless and I couldn't fault anything. The shopping mall underneath the hotel is not open yet but I expect completion isn't too far away. This isn't the best 5 star hotel I've stayed in but I certainly don't have any complaints, it is competitively priced. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: TimRattray
Reviews.Content: Normally stay at the Intercont but wanted to try something different This is a new hotel with great location Stayed with a special intro deal SGD 288++ which was very good value Room was small but comfortable, modern and well-apppointed I found the staff to be extremely helpful and service was great Complimentary wireless internet but unfortunately no coverage in my room Not sure what the normal rates are, but if on a par with other central hotels I would be happy to stay again

Reviews.Title: “Nice location but terrible staff and service.”
Reviews.Author: TravelLeisure_10
Reviews.Content: I am actually writing this review while staying at the hotel. Although the location of the hotel is excellent, the service has been terrible. The staff is extremely new and inattentive. As a new hotel, I would go to any means to satisfy your guests. I called the hotel several times before my arrival to arrange for a car service from the hotel and not one person was able to help me out. They hung up on me several times. The room is extremely small and although it is a new hotel the room is worn out (broken furniture pieces, pen marks on the wall, etc.) I have called the hotel staff regarding these issues and I have been ignored. I travel around the world for business and I must say this has been one of the worst hotels I have stayed in. For the price, I would stay at the Four Seasons or St. Regis in Singapore. I thought I would give this new hotel a try but it was a big mistake.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location with excellent service”
Reviews.Author: aditi26
Reviews.Content: My family & I visited Singapore in October 2010 & stayed at the Grand Park Orchard. We were with 2 young children & the hotel management posed no problem with all of us staying in one room where almost every hotel in Singapore had refused. The location of the hotel is fantastic with literally a GUCCI sign reflecting against your windows....its ideal for every shopper to leave their bags and rest & go back & hit the shops... The service at the hotel was exceptional with every small need being catered to... all in all i would definitely recommend this hotel to everybody

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel for business and pleasure”
Reviews.Author: omsy
Reviews.Content: Located in the heart of Orchard Road. Best location possible. From the moment we stepped in the hotel we were showered with top class service consistently. Food was great and aesthetics was pleasing throughout. Everything I required to facilitate my business trip from internet, to club floor facilities, to business center were catered for very efficiently. My accompanying wife loved the room and the fact that she could walk to anywhere to anywhere in Orchard Road within minutes. We were particularly swept off our feet by the Club floor service. Ms Rhea and Mr Alam Albahar had sincerely gone out of their ways to ensure our stay was unforgettable. Having stayed in numerous hotels in Singapore, this new hotel takes the top spot in my favourite list. The price is also more reasonable then others in its class.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here unless you get attractive rates!”
Reviews.Author: GoldPassport
Reviews.Content: Just check in today as I write this review. Located in middle of orchard rd. Lobby and check in process was excellent but that was it ! It's new hotel so room is still fresh, looking good. Size is pretty small, bed not comfy, no wall socket for your shaver in small bathroom. Phone did not work properly, complained about this without response. Aircon flows directly to my head that cause me headache after my sleep, regardless which side of bed I sleep at. There's useless multiple adaptor on working desk but can't fit any of my gadget charger, so I had to crawl underneath the tv to find wall socket. I saw guests lining up to get taxi. while the hotel staff waving his hands to stop taxis, no taxi entering the hotel ( they prefer fetching passangers waiting at paragon mall located across the hotel). Make sure to pre-book your transport to the airport or you'll be disgruntled waiting for cab. To conclude, if you ever stayed in mandarin orchard, hyatt, Marriott, royal plaza during your visit in singapore you will be dissapointed choosing this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “it was an excellent hotel with very friendly behaviour of the staff that makes me feel so comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: veenujakarta
Reviews.Content: hotel has just been renovated. decor is very good. food at the restaurant is fabolous.

Reviews.Title: “standar service hotel”
Reviews.Author: lumbangorat
Reviews.Content: the room and service is standard, but the location of the hotel is in the heart of singapore shopping center in famous orchard road. breakfast is quite good, but i cannot say best.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location - Pathetic Service.”
Reviews.Author: shatru
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, great walk about and good choice of breakfast. Unfortunately nothing much to be said about the staff. It seemed like they were doing us a favor by checking us into the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, great rooms at great Prices!”
Reviews.Author: OrangeinTraveller
Reviews.Content: It was my first time in Singapore and I traveled with two families and a couple. Needless to say, we were large group looking for great accommodations at a decent price in Singapore---and Park Hotel Orchard Road gave us just that. Not only is the hotel located at Orchard Road, the trendiest part of Singapore, but it boasts of great service and free breakfast buffets. The rooms were clean, comfortable, fully furnished and air conditioned. Park Hotel was across one of Singapore's best malls, Takashimaya which provided lots of food/ grocery choices. The location saved us a lot of money since practically everything is a walking distance. I even remember the ice cream vendor across the street which pacified a lot of my younger cousins. I would also like to thank the manager of Park Hotel who has been very very hospitable to weary travelers like us. Though I forgot his name, I can never forget the kindness he showed our family. If we needed taxis, guides, information, cellphones, even last minute airplane bookings and directions, he and his staff were always there, personally and attentively taking care of my needs. It was also comforting to know that most of the staff are fluent in a lot of foreign languages so chatting with them on whats and what-nots of Singapore was a breeze. On top of that, when there was a mix up on airline reservations, Park hotel staff helped us re-book and allowed us to stay in the lobby for an extra hour or two. It was a wonderful gesture that definitely made our stay in Singapore all the more fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: ambience4u
Reviews.Content: This was one good stay, just because the location of the hotel is great. Otherwise, the staff behaviour was pathetic and service was poor.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic with a Indians nearby”
Reviews.Author: VRJ
Reviews.Content: Overall a fantastic hotel to stay. It has all the facilities which one expect from swimming to gym. Good peop-le to welcome and serve you. Very near to Indian city in Singapore. So people of indian culture will like to country and get easy access to food, goods which they would like to see/eat

Reviews.Title: “Convenient hotel”
Reviews.Author: getsetg0
Reviews.Content: I was travelling with my wife when she was expecting ... this hotel has a great location as this is in the heart of the city and has also all facilities that one would look for !

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Park Orchard
HotelInfo.Address: 270 Orchard Road, Singapore 238857, Singapore (Formerly Crown Hotel at Orchard)
